mapper.sql: id, name, unitTotal, pliesTotal, buildingType, buildingStructure, orientation
mapper.select:
select count(1) from buildingView where 1=1
and `name` LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{buildingName },'%')
SELECT id,`name` FROM buildingView WHERE communityId=#{communityId}
SELECT unitTotal FROM building WHERE id=#{buildingId}
SELECT pliesTotal FROM building WHERE id=#{buildingId}
mapper.update:
update building
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitTotal = #{unittotal,jdbcType=BIGINT},
pliesTotal = #{pliestotal,jdbcType=BIGINT},
buildingType = #{buildingtype,jdbcType=BIGINT},
buildingStructure = #{buildingstructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orientation = #{orientation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into building (name, unitTotal, pliesTotal, buildingType, buildingStructure, orientation) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unittotal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pliestotal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buildingtype,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buildingstructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orientation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into building
id,
name,
unitTotal,
pliesTotal,
buildingType,
buildingStructure,
orientation,
